AMDOCS LTD ("DOX-Q")
- Analyst Reports and Industry Awards Highlight Amdocs' Leadership in
- 5G, Digital Transformation, Cloud and Customer Experience in 2021

     Amdocs, a leading provider of software and services to communications
and media companies, today announced it has been named a leader in multiple
domains by global analyst firms and highly-regarded awards programs
covering the industry's vendor landscape.

     Through a series of award wins and analyst commendations, Amdocs has
been recognized for its market leadership in the technologies and trends
that are driving innovation in communications and media and enabling
next-generation experiences for both consumers and enterprises.

     AMDOCS SUSTAINS AND GROWS MARKET-SHARE LEADERSHIP IN MONETIZATION AND
REVENUE MANAGEMENT

     *  Analysys Mason recognized Amdocs as the global leader in the
overall monetization platforms product-related market for the 14th
consecutive year with an estimated market share of 24 per cent.
     *  Analysys Mason ranked Amdocs as the leader in global monetization
platforms in professional services with an estimated market share of 9 per
cent.
     *  GlobalData ranked Amdocs as a global leader in revenue management.
     *  Amdocs MarketONE won the Excellence in Payment/Crypto/Commerce
Award at the 13th annual Media Excellence Awards, which honor global
innovation and leadership in mobile, technology and entertainment.
     *  The International Trade Association for the Broadcast & Media
Industry awarded its 2020 BaM(R) award in the Monetize category to Amdocs
MarketONE in another win for the cloud-native, SaaS, scalable platform.

     A GLOBAL LEADER IN DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION, CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE,
TELCO/IT SERVICES AND QUALITY ENGINEERING

     *  Amdocs took home the Outstanding Digital Enablement Vendor Award at
Light Reading's Leading Lights Awards for the second year running.
     *  A GlobalData report recognized Amdocs as a leader in Digital
Transformation Platforms.
     *  Omdia ranked Amdocs as the global leader for both Telecom IT
Applications Services (market share = 16 per cent) and Telco IT Software &
Services (market share = 14 per cent).
     *  The TM Forum Excellence Awards 2021 saw Amdocs and Airtel claim
victory in the Customer Experience and Trust category following Amdocs'
introduction of AI-driven automated operations that dramatically improved
Airtel's digital operations and reduced customer frustration to near-zero
levels.
     *  A NelsonHall report ranked Amdocs first for market share (14 per
cent) in Quality Engineering Services for Telecoms.

     A PIONEER IN CLOUD AND 5G INNOVATION

     *  Amdocs was a 2021 Global Amazon Web Services (AWS) Partner Network
(APN) Public Sector Partner Award winner for its Customer Experience Suite
(CES). This award recognizes leaders who play a key role helping customers
drive innovation and build solutions using AWS Cloud technology.
     *  Amdocs was formally recognized as the industry leader in cloud
technology innovation at Total Telecom's Asia Communication Awards by
winning the Cloud Technology Initiative award for its "game-changing"
Microservices360 (MS360) platform.
     *  The Asia Communication Awards also saw success for Amdocs in the 5G
Technology Initiative category, with Amdocs Monetization Suite being named
the winner.
     *  GlobalData named Amdocs a leader in both Product Configuration &
Capacity in Policy Control and Standards & Interface Support in Policy
Control.

     CONTINUED LEADERSHIP IN SERVICE AND NETWORK AUTOMATION

     *  Analysys Mason ranked Amdocs as the global leader in service design
and orchestration product revenue for the fourth year in a row, with an
estimated market share of 14 per cent.
     *  Amdocs was named the winner of the Most Innovative Hybrid
Networking Strategy Award at Light Reading's Leading Lights Awards.
     *  GlobalData named Amdocs a leader for both Portfolio Scope in
Network Service Orchestration and Standards & Interface Support in Network
Service Orchestration.

     Supporting Resources

     *  Keep up with Amdocs news by visiting the company's website
     *  Follow us on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn and YouTube

     About Amdocs
Amdocs helps those who build the future to make it amazing. With our
market-leading portfolio of software products and services, we unlock our
customers' innovative potential, empowering them to provide next-generation
communication and media experiences for both the individual end user and
enterprise customers. Our 28,000 employees around the globe are here to
accelerate service providers' migration to the cloud, enable them to
differentiate in the 5G era, and digitalize and automate their operations.
Listed on the NASDAQ Global Select Market, Amdocs had revenue of $4.3
billion in fiscal 2021. For more information, visit www.amdocs.com
